config.section.Seasonal Appearance.name: Seasonal Appearance
config.section.Seasonal Appearance.descr: This is the setting for whether or not each mini obelisk changes in appearance with the seasons.

config.section.Obelisk created in SF(wit: Please do not change the settings of obelisks created with Solid Foundations (SF) while playing (in-game). Changing settings during play (in-game) may cause unforeseen bugs, although this is unlikely to happen.

config.section.Section for line breaks.d: This item is a non-functional item to address a problem that occurs when mod config is displayed in a particular language and the necessary items are not displayed until the end.
config.This is a meaningless item.name: This is a meaningless item
config.This is a meaningless item.descri: This item is a non-functional item to address a problem that occurs when mod config is displayed in a particular language and the necessary items are not displayed until the end. There is no point in turning it on and off, so you can switch it on and off as much as you like and play with it.
